    main.js

    function countDate()
{
    var startDate = new Date(2020, 11, 14); // μ‹μ‘μΌ
    var today = new Date(); // μ¤λ
    var total = new Date(); // κ²½κ³Όμ‹κ°„
    total.setTime((today.getTime() - startDate.getTime()) / 1000 / 60 / 60 / 24);
    $('#codingDays').attr('data-number', total.getTime());
}
